page.title: 13A SHOPPING LIST
page.content:
We thought that it would be a good idea to compile a shopping list featuring some every day items that people buy.We have also included a few luxury items which we think some homes might have.
1 A can of Coca Cola{17p } 2 A Mars bar{18p 3 1 Dozen eggs {90p (approx.) 4 250g of butter {90p} 5 A record (single 45rpm){Â£1.45 6 1L of petrol {39p 7 16" Teletext colour T.V.{Â£350 8 BBC micro computer {Â£399} 9 A micro wave oven{Â£300} 10 Ford Escort (basic Model) {Â£3950 { }(List compiled on 15th July 1985)
The prices that we have given to these items are the cheapest we can find.
